string.name: cat_navigationdrawer_title
string.description: The title for the navigation drawer demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigationdrawer_description
string.description: Brief summary about navigation drawer component demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=500]

resources.string: 抽屉式导航提供对目的地和应用程序功能的访问，例如切换帐户。它们可以永久显示在屏幕上，也可以通过导航菜单图标进行控制。

string.name: cat_navigationdrawer_instructions
string.description: Instructions for the navigation drawer demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=300]

resources.string: 按上面的顶部应用栏菜单图标可打开开始对齐的导航抽屉。 \n\n 或者按下面的按钮打开末端对齐的导航抽屉

string.name: cat_navigationdrawer_show_end_drawer
string.description: Label for opening the navigation drawer at the end of the screen. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigationdrawer_custom_title
string.description: The title for the custom navigation drawer demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]

string.name: cat_navigationdrawer_custom_text
string.description: Text for the custom navigation drawer demo. [CHAR_LIMIT=100]
